thread.title: New Couple Alert: Anwar Hadid Is Dating Nicola Peltz
thread.title_full: New Couple Alert: Anwar Hadid Is Dating Nicola Peltz

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: New Couple Alert: Anwar Hadid Is Dating Nicola Peltz
text: New Couple Alert: Anwar Hadid Is Dating Nicola Peltz by Jennifer Drysdale 5:59 PM PST, January 19, 2017 Photo: Instagram Anwar Hadid is off the market! The 17-year-old brother of Gigi and Bella Hadid is dating actress Nicole Peltz, E! News confirms. EXCLUSIVE: Inside Justin Bieber's Date With Actress Nicola Peltz, and Why He's Ready to Settle Down Again The couple, who were photographed holding hands in Beverly Hills earlier this week, have been rumored to be dating for a while. In fact, Peltz shared a cute snap of herself sitting on Hadid's lap on Instagram. "Taken by the queen @ellenvonunwerth," she captioned the shot, from what appears to be her birthday dinner last Friday. A photo posted by Nicola Peltz (@nicolaannepeltz) on Jan 13, 2017 at 5:30pm PST A video posted by Nicola Anne Peltz ðŸ“¸ (@nicolapnews) on Jan 13, 2017 at 5:41pm PST A video posted by Nicola Anne Peltz ðŸ“¸ (@nicolapnews) on Jan 14, 2017 at 4:06pm PST The cute couple also rang in the New Year together, as a few fan accounts captured screenshots from their New Year's kiss. A photo posted by Nicola Anne Peltz ðŸ“¸ (@nicolapnews) on Jan 1, 2017 at 11:45am PST RELATED: Move Over Gigi and Bella! Little Brother Anwar Hadid Signs With IMG Models Though Hadid and Peltz share the same friend group, the Transformers: Age of Extinction actress was most recently linked to Justin Bieber . Peltz and the pop star were photographed on several dates in Los Angeles and Canada last spring, but their romance fizzled out after a few weeks. Before Bieber, Peltz dated The Last Ship actor Cameron Fuller. Hadid, meanwhile, has been busy working on his modeling career, recently becoming the face of Hugo Boss' spring 2017 line. ET has reached out to reps for Hadid and Peltz for comment. While Anwar heats things up with Peltz, his sister, Bella Hadid, seems to have narrowly avoided a run-in with her ex, The Weeknd, at Madison Square Garden in New York City on Wednesday night. The singer was spotted kissing Selena Gomez last week. See more in the video below. SHARE ON FACEBOOK SHARE SHARE ON TWITTER TWEET
